title: Smá ljóð
text:
Skutum niður tvær orcur í gær í wormhole. Scoutinn okkar ákvað að semja lítið ljóð um það.
Logistics is dull
I bet they are pretty bored
Ha. Not anymore.
Saw Chitsa go by
Question the wisdom of this
Screw it, let's do it.
My friend is pointed
But I'm sure I'll be just fine
Who carries two points?
A bid to escape
Follow! Who care's if it's crit?
You only live once
The silence is deep
But faintly I think I hear
Heads pounding on desks
Hole collapsed? So what
We will take the long road home
A true adventure
